task.title: Tutorials: Developing content with information types
task.shortdesc: These tutorials introduce you to the different types of DITA topic: the basic topic type, task type, concept type, and reference type.

taskbody.prereq:
Before you start, you should be familiar with the following tasks in your editor:
Opening and saving new documents
Adding elements to documents
Adding attributes to elements
Creating output using IDWB
You should also have your preview options set to include your project directory, in this case a tut-content/ directory in which you will do the work for this tutorial.

context.p: Each of the tutorials has a matching sample. You can choose to skip portions of the tutorials by copying content from the samples. See for a listing of the samples.
The tutorials can be performed in any sequence, but the order shown is preferable.
